Title: Establishes the emergency preparedness month act and exempts prefabricated go-bags and individual emergency preparedness items
Summary: Establishes the "emergency preparedness month act" and exempts prefabricated go-bags and individual emergency preparedness items from sales tax during specified time periods.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing the emergency preparedness month act and to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting prefabricated go-bags and individual emergency preparedness items
